title: Van benefit from 2005/06: transition to the new regime (table)

details.body:
## Sections 114 and 154 ITEPA 2003 Finance Act 2004 changed the van benefits regime with effect from 2005/06. However, the government decided to stagger the transition so that the new regime did not come into full effect until 2007/08 with some elements of the old regime remaining in place until 2006/07. In order to minimise confusion, the table below summarises the changes and includes hyperlinks to guidance on the new regime only.
### Description ### Previous regime: years to 2004/05 ### Transitional years: (2005/06 & 2006/07) ### New regime: years from 2007/08
Private use (all kinds) £500 (£350 if van is 4 years old) n/a n/a
Private use: restricted private use condition ([EIM22795](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22795)) met n/a Nil, [EIM22790](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22790)  Nil, [EIM22790](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22790) 
Private use: all other n/a £500 (£350 if van is 4 years old); [EIM22790](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22790)  £3000, [EIM22790](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22790) 
Reduction for unavailability Yes Yes, [EIM22820](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22820)  Yes, [EIM22820](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22820) 
Shared vans Separate rules Just & reasonable, [EIM22830](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22830)  Just & reasonable, [EIM22830](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22830) 
Reduction for payments for private use Shared and exclusive vans separate From benefit charge for each van, [EIM22840](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22840)  From benefit charge for each van, [EIM22840](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22840) 
Replacement vans rules Yes, [EIM22850](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22850)  Yes, [EIM22850](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22850) 
Effect of insignificant private use Full charge No benefit charge, [EIM22745](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22745)  No benefit charge, [EIM22745](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22745) 
Pooled vans No benefit charge No benefit charge, [EIM23450](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM23000#EIM23450) onwards No benefit charge, [EIM23450](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM23000#EIM23450) onwards
Van fuel benefit charge (all vans) n/a n/a
Van fuel benefit charge (restricted private use condition met) n/a n/a n/a
Van fuel benefit charge (restricted private use condition not met) n/a Yes, [EIM22900](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22900) (charge nil, so ignore in practice) Yes, [EIM22900](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22900) 
There is a summary of the new regime in the table at [EIM22702](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22700#EIM22702). ### Years to 2004/05 Full guidance on van benefit for these years can be found using the contents page at [EIM22050](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22050).
